name: Ambala Bar Association
description: Ambala Bar Association application is an official directory application of District Bar Association Ambala. Having following features Contacts -  1. Contacts number and information of Governing Body, Members, Judges, Revenue officers. 2. Add contacts to phonebook and make calls. 3. Export and delete all contacts to phonebook  Events - Images and Descriptions of Events.    District Bar Association Ambala is an association of Lawyers in Ambala City, State Haryana, India- 134003.
